definition: to stick close to/to press up against
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: Cling to clean rock, hard climb.
sentences.chinese: 緊貼着乾淨的山岩，艱難地攀登。

sentences.english: His hair was plastered down to his scalp by the rain.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮淋雨後緊貼在頭皮上。

sentences.english: Hard, wiry and straight, lying close to the body with a definite undercoat.
sentences.chinese: 剛毛，毛質硬且直，緊貼身體，有一定的底毛。

sentences.english: The first printed books were made by putting ink on a wooden block and holding the paper against it.
sentences.chinese: 第一本印刷書是用紙緊貼塗有墨汁的木版製成的。

sentences.english: The snowballs splatted on the trees.
sentences.chinese: 雪球打在樹上就緊貼上去了。

sentences.english: A piezoelectric element is appressed with the impacting object.
sentences.chinese: 一個壓電元素是緊貼與衝擊的對象。

sentences.english: The shoulders are well laid back, well muscled, and lie close to the body.
sentences.chinese: 肩膀向後傾斜，發達的肌肉，緊貼著身體。

sentences.english: And I've lived close to them all my life.
sentences.chinese: 我的整個人生，都緊貼着它們生活。

sentences.english: After you are satisfied, please use strength to compaction, let back glue paste on window frame.
sentences.chinese: 滿意後用力緊壓，讓背膠緊貼於窗框。

sentences.english: It’s designed to fit snugly onto a rotary tool, which can spin the tubes at 33,000 rpm, producing up to 51,000 g’s.
sentences.chinese: 它被設計成緊貼在一臺旋轉的設備上。

sentences.english: Bracketing the wedge-shaped ship were a set of flat wings extending above and below the ship.
sentences.chinese: 一組平板機翼上下張開，緊貼楔形船體兩側。

sentences.english: Two legs and right, try to involve first to bed face, back is clingy implantation.
sentences.chinese: 兩腿同時先向右側，儘量涉及牀面，背部緊貼着牀。

sentences.english: Only the children are flattening their noses against the window-panes.
sentences.chinese: 只有小孩子纔會把鼻子緊貼在車窗上。

sentences.english: The baby had thin, tightly adherent skin that causes arthrogryposis and respiratory insufficiency.
sentences.chinese: 患嬰有著薄，緊貼的皮膚，造成關節臠縮及呼吸不全。

sentences.english: Leaf-tailed geckos cling to the trees, cloaked in green.
sentences.chinese: 葉尾壁虎緊貼在樹上，隱藏在一片綠色之中。

sentences.english: Chandler: Are you hugging the door right now.
sentences.chinese: 你現在在緊貼着門說話嗎？

definition: to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
